tiny little place... not enough seating...BUT THE BEST FALAFEL!  I go for the salad bowl, and ask for very little lettuce - that way i can pile on all the wonderful condiments/toppings available at that salad bar.  I almost like those better than the falafel.  no... scratch that - the falafels are great. Thank you for being open late when i'm starving after too many of those GinTonicas... so after a night of dancing & drinking, be sure you keep an extra 5 euros for Maoz.  *** full disclaimer - It's also just as wonderful when totally sober in the middle of the day.
